meanings.definition: A tool used to sharpen pencils or knives.
meanings.sent1: I used the sharpener to make my pencil pointy.
meanings.sent2: The teacher handed out a sharpener to each student.
meanings.sent3: The sharpener decided to take a break after sharpening so many pencils.
meanings.sent4: Her wit was like a sharpener, honing his arguments to perfection.
meanings.sent5: The sharpener whirred as it transformed the dull pencil into a precise writing tool.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that sharpens.
meanings.sent1: The knife sharpener had a steady hand.
meanings.sent2: The sharpener of skills helped the team improve.
meanings.sent3: The sharpener at the fair had a line of blunt tools waiting for attention.
meanings.sent4: His criticism was a sharpener, refining her work to excellence.
meanings.sent5: The sharpener's touch brought out the best in every blade it encountered.
